response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering the high worth of the product to you stands at $8,000. I trust this price reflects a fair compromise, allowing you to enjoy the benefits of the product while ensuring a profitable transaction for me. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 9500}
